query:
SELECT
                        dms.id,
                        dms.chunk,
                        dms.pos,
                        dms.p_value,
                        dms.created_at,
                        dms.log2_fold_change,
                        dms.log2_std_error,
                        dms.statistic,
                        dms.condition,
                        dms.aa,
                        dms.version,
                        proteins.protein
                    FROM dms
                    JOIN proteins ON dms.protein_id = proteins.id
                    WHERE proteins.protein = $1
                    AND dms.condition = $2
                    ORDER BY dms.pos, dms.aa
                    LIMIT $3 OFFSET $4
